PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-16402012-12-06,  TC,  FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectAmendments to increase the Prince Rupert Port Authority Borrowing Limit
PrecisOrder Amending the PRINCE RUPERT PORT AUTHORITY LETTERS PATENT in order to increase its borrowing limit, allowing it to grow and expand its business by investing in development projects and port infrastructure.
AttachmentsAttachment
